name: BuyBitcoin-PriceConverterToFromUSD&EUR
0:
”Alexa, open Buy Bitcoin!”
”How many Bitcoin can I buy with 100 dollars?”
”How much is 2.5 Bitcoin in Euro?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: buy bitcoin
des:
Buy Bitcoin helps you convert various amounts of Bitcoin in U.S. Dollars and Euro and vice versa.

After opening the skill using "Alexa, open Buy Bitcoin!", you can ask any questions similar to the ones below.

"How many Bitcoin can I buy with 100 dollars?"

"How many Bitcoin can I buy with 10000 euro?"

"How much is 1.5 Bitcoin in dollars?"

"How much is 2.34 Bitcoin in euro?"

Enjoy!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
